targets.query: select last(uptime_format) from system where  host =~ /^$host$/
SELECT last(n_cpus) FROM "system" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/  fill(null)
SELECT last("total") FROM "mem" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/
SELECT last("n_users") FROM "system" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/
SELECT last("total") FROM "processes" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/
SELECT last("total_threads") FROM "processes" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/
SELECT 100 - last(usage_idle) - 1 FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ and "cpu" = 'cpu-total'
SELECT last(used_percent) FROM "mem" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/
SELECT last("load1") FROM "system" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/
SELECT last("load5") FROM "system" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/
SELECT last("load15") FROM "system" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/
SELECT last("total") FROM "mem" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("available") FROM "mem" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("used") FROM "mem" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("cached") FROM "mem" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("buffered") FROM "mem" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("usage_idle") FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("usage_iowait") FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("usage_user") FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("usage_system") FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "cpu" = 'cpu-total' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("total") FROM disk WHERE $timeFilter AND "host" =~ /^$host$/  GROUP BY time($interval),  "device", "path" fill(null)
SELECT mean("free") FROM disk WHERE $timeFilter AND "host" =~ /^$host$/  GROUP BY time($interval), "device", "path" fill(null)
SELECT mean("used") FROM disk WHERE $timeFilter AND "host" =~ /^$host$/  GROUP BY time($interval), "device", "path" fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("bytes_recv"), 1s)FROM "net" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "interface" fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("bytes_sent"), 1s) FROM "net" WHERE $timeFilter  AND "host" =~ /^$host$/ GROUP BY time($interval), "interface" fill(null)
SELECT mean("load1") FROM "system" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("load5") FROM "system" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("load15") FROM "system" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean(total_threads) FROM processes WHERE  host =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter  GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean(total) FROM processes WHERE  host =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter  GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean(sleeping) FROM processes WHERE  host =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter  GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean(running) FROM processes WHERE  host =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter  GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean(blocked) FROM processes WHERE  host =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter  GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean(zombies) FROM processes WHERE  host =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter  GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT derivative(mean(context_switches), 1s) FROM kernel WHERE  host =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter  GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT derivative(mean(processes_forked), 1s) FROM kernel WHERE  host =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter  GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT derivative(mean(interrupts), 1s) FROM kernel WHERE  host =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter  GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT derivative(last("drop_in")) FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "interface" fill(null)
SELECT derivative(last("drop_out")) FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "interface" fill(null)
SELECT derivative(last("err_in")) FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "interface" fill(null)
SELECT derivative(last("err_out")) FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "interface" fill(null)
SELECT mean(tcp_established)   FROM "netstat" WHERE $timeFilter and "host" =~ /^$host$/ GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean(tcp_syn_recv)   FROM "netstat" WHERE $timeFilter and "host" =~ /^$host$/ GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean(tcp_time_wait)   FROM "netstat" WHERE $timeFilter and "host" =~ /^$host$/ GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean(close_wait)   FROM "netstat" WHERE $timeFilter and "host" =~ /^$host$/ GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean(udp_socket)   FROM "netstat" WHERE $timeFilter and "host" =~ /^$host$/ GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT derivative(last("write_bytes")) FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "name" fill(null)
SELECT derivative(last("read_bytes"))  FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "name" fill(null)
SELECT derivative(mean("writes"), 1s) AS "write iops" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "name" fill(null)
SELECT derivative(mean("reads"), 1s) AS "read iops" FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "name" fill(null)
SELECT derivative(mean("io_time"), 1ms) FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "name" fill(null)
SELECT derivative(mean("weighted_io_time"), 1ms) FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "name" fill(null)
select last("inodes_total") from disk where $timeFilter and "host" =~ /^$host$/  group by time($interval), "path" fill(null)
select last("inodes_used") from disk where $timeFilter and "host" =~ /^$host$/  and "device" =~ /^$disk$/ group by time($interval), "path" fill(null)
select last("inodes_free") from disk where $timeFilter and "host" =~ /^$host$/  group by time($interval), "path" fill(null)
SELECT mean("used_percent") FROM "disk" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "path"  fill(null)

list.label: Container
list.name: host
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "system" WITH KEY = "host" WHERE "node_type" = 'container'
